code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{feesApi}from'../../services/adminApi';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const StudentSearch=_ref=>{let{onStudentSelect,placeholder="Search student by ID, name, class..."}=_ref;const[query,setQuery]=useState('');const[suggestions,setSuggestions]=useState([]);const[isLoading,setIsLoading]=useState(false);const[showSuggestions,setShowSuggestions]=useState(false);useEffect(()=>{const searchStudents=async()=>{if(query.length<2){setSuggestions([]);return;}setIsLoading(true);const result=await feesApi.searchStudent(query);setIsLoading(false);if(result.success){setSuggestions(result.data);}else{setSuggestions([]);}};const debounceTimer=setTimeout(searchStudents,300);return()=>clearTimeout(debounceTimer);},[query]);const handleSelect=student=>{setQuery("".concat(student.id," - ").concat(student.name));setShowSuggestions(false);onStudentSelect(student);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"student-search",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:query,onChange:e=>setQuery(e.target.value),onFocus:()=>setShowSuggestions(true),onBlur:()=>setTimeout(()=>setShowSuggestions(false),200),placeholder:placeholder,className:"student-search-input"}),isLoading&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"loading",children:"Searching..."}),showSuggestions&&suggestions.length>0&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"suggestions-list",children:suggestions.map(student=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{onClick:()=>handleSelect(student),className:"suggestion-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"student-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"student-id",children:student.id}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"student-name",children:student.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"student-class",children:[student.class," - ",student.session]})]})},student._id))})]});};export default StudentSearch;
